songs.title: I Don’t Feel
songs.lyrics:
I hear the footsteps tap
And I knock on the door
Who is it for?
Who is it for?
Go away you've been here to see
Is it for me?

Close my eyes
And try to imagine
Your sweet touch
Your manner
Been to much of madness
Now I know so much

Somewere along the road
We lost the connection
You offered directions
That I couldn't take
Now let's parole
Without shine or vision
Wasn't my decision

I don't feel when the earth starts shaking
I don't feel when my heart starts reaping
I can't feel when the ship starts sinking, no
I'm not touched by whatever you're faking
I don't feel when the earth starts shaking, oh no
I don't feel when my heart starts reaping, no!
I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel you at all

I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel
No, I don't feel
I don't feel
I don't feel you at all

I hear the footsteps tap
And I knock on the door
Who is it for?
Who is it for?
Go away you've been here to see
Is it for me?
